trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to the tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when it matches a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref>.
It is also used in the return list of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents"></xref> property.

When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
The tracking service can perform whatever action is necessary on the data in the tracking record.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> class.
This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> value, <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref>, number, and <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref>.
`eventDateTime` is expressed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
`eventOrder` is guaranteed to be unique within the workflow instance; however, it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that indicates the date and time of the workflow status event associated with the tracking record.
The relative order in which the workflow status event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.

Either a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs"></xref>, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the collection of annotations associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref> that was matched.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref>.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains additional data associated with certain types of workflow status events.

For most workflow status events, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`); however, for certain kinds of workflow status events the runtime tracking infrastructure uses <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to return additional data about the workflow status event.

The following table lists the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that correspond to these special workflow status events and the type of object returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> for each of these workflow status events.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> Value
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> Object
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Either a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs"></xref>, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the date and time that the workflow tracking event occurred.
The <xref:System.DateTime> is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that indicates the date and time that the workflow status event occurred.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the workflow status event that matched the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indicates the relative order in the workflow instance of the workflow status event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A value that indicates the order of the workflow status event in the workflow instance.
Gets or sets the type of workflow status event associated with the tracking record.

`TrackingWorkflowEvent` contains one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values indicating the kind of workflow status event that was matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to be sent.
It reflects the current status of the workflow instance.

A workflow instance emits workflow status events only when the status of the workflow instance changes, and, therefore, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can be matched only when a workflow status change occurs.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> values.
